summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of $4,200.00, or so much thereof as may be necessary, from the General Fund, and ordering the same paid into Local Improvement District Fund No. 1022, for the purpose of paying the balance due on outstanding warrants Nos. 6076, 6077, 6078, 6079, 6080, 6081, 6082 and 6083, and directing the Mayor and Comptroller to draw a warrant on the General Fund in said sum in favor of said Local Improvement District Fund.
